properties.name: observability.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable all observability features

properties.name: observability.logging.mdc-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable MDC filter for distributed tracing

properties.name: observability.logging.json-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable JSON format logging

properties.name: observability.logging.additional-mdc-keys
properties.description: Additional MDC keys to include in logs

properties.name: observability.metrics.prometheus-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Prometheus metrics export

properties.name: observability.metrics.application-name
properties.description: Application name tag for metrics (defaults to spring.application.name)

properties.name: observability.metrics.environment
properties.description: Environment tag for metrics (dev, staging, production)

properties.name: observability.metrics.common-tags
properties.description: Common tags to apply to all metrics

properties.name: observability.actuator.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable actuator endpoint configuration

properties.name: observability.actuator.expose-all
properties.description: Expose all actuator endpoints (use with caution)

properties.name: observability.actuator.show-details
properties.description: When to show detailed health information (always, never, when-authorized)
